attributes.action: Stop the Badman Review being implemented.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the Badman review has been implemented,the LEA will have the right to enter people homes and interview there children without the parents being present!The government want to change the rights of the parents to educate their children in the way that the parents see best.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
